name: Sashe Ithanes
loreDescription: This is the Sashe Ithanes. It is a flame that will shake the world on its axis, that will destroy people, cities, kingdoms, even dreams. Take it, and in my name bring an end to everything.

skillDescription.base: Increases Combat Readiness of all Allies by 15.0% when the enemy is defeated.
skillDescription.max: Increases Combat Readiness of all Allies by 30.0% when the enemy is defeated.
